message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I think you'll really like it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $180 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Let's see if we can work something out.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $165?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $165 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $140.  This is a fair price for both of us, as I'm sure you'll agree.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $155?
